author: michael
content: Bullish: I'm not concerned about the impact tariff will have on Amazon.  I'm extremely bullish based heavily on AWS, AI, Advertising and eventually Internet Worldwide.  Hold long term and you will be financially rewarded.  Long and bullish.

author: Phil
content: Amazon stock price at all-time highs, relative to June 6th 2023, 20:1 split! Folks taking some profit. It only makes sense. Holding. GLOT.
